annotations.description: Unique identifier of the transaction. Coincides with the identifier of the original transaction for refund transactions. Coincides with SuccessfulPayment.telegram_payment_charge_id for successful incoming payments from users.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the transaction. Coincides with the identifier of the original transaction for refund transactions. Coincides with SuccessfulPayment.telegram_payment_charge_id for successful incoming payments from users.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the transaction. Coincides with the identifier of the original transaction for refund transactions. Coincides with *SuccessfulPayment.telegram_payment_charge_id* for successful incoming payments from users.
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction
annotations.html_description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction
annotations.rst_description: Integer amount of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction
annotations.name: amount

annotations.description: The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction; from 0 to 999999999
annotations.html_description: Optional. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction; from 0 to 999999999
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The number of 1/1000000000 shares of Telegram Stars transferred by the transaction; from 0 to 999999999
annotations.name: nanostar_amount

annotations.description: Date the transaction was created in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Date the transaction was created in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: Date the transaction was created in Unix time
annotations.name: date

annotations.description: Source of an incoming transaction (e.g., a user purchasing goods or services, Fragment refunding a failed withdrawal). Only for incoming transactions
annotations.html_description: Optional. Source of an incoming transaction (e.g., a user purchasing goods or services, Fragment refunding a failed withdrawal). Only for incoming transactions
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Source of an incoming transaction (e.g., a user purchasing goods or services, Fragment refunding a failed withdrawal). Only for incoming transactions
annotations.name: source

annotations.description: Receiver of an outgoing transaction (e.g., a user for a purchase refund, Fragment for a withdrawal). Only for outgoing transactions
annotations.html_description: Optional. Receiver of an outgoing transaction (e.g., a user for a purchase refund, Fragment for a withdrawal). Only for outgoing transactions
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Receiver of an outgoing transaction (e.g., a user for a purchase refund, Fragment for a withdrawal). Only for outgoing transactions
annotations.name: receiver
